entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
